## ratlas <a href='https://github.com/atlas-aai/ratlas'><img src='featured-hex.png' align="right" width="120" alt='Hex logo for the ratlas package.'/></a>

ratlas is an *R* package that provides the infrastructure for reproducible reporting writing with Accessible Teaching, Learning, and Assessment Systems (ATLAS) at the University of Kansas.
Included are various R Markdown templates for generating reports, custom ggplot2 themes, and miscellaneous helper functions for matting numbers, text, and tables.
This package may be used as an example for creating a similar package within other organizations.
